data.name: LocoMotion
data.detailed_description:
Locomotion is a Action, Platformer Game Inspired by many other Games out there. This game has a fascinating story behind it! Play it to find out what secrets the Acidic Waters have in store for you!
You play as a crash test dummy, and the people who made you need to test your strength.

Features Included In-Game

  • Roll
  • Sprint
  • Jump
  • Lock-on Mode

Chapters & Levels

Chapters
  • Chapter 1 - Level 1-5
  • Chapter 2 - Level 5-10
  • Chapter 3 - Level 10-15
  • The End - Level 15
Levels
  • Level 1
  • Level 2
  • Level 3
  • Level 4
  • Level 5
  • Level 6
  • Level 7
  • Level 8
  • Level 9
  • Level 10
  • Level 11
  • Level 12
  • Level 13
  • Level 14
  • Level 15


DO NOT REPLICATE ANY ACTIONS IN GAME, WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY INJURIES, Thank you

data.short_description: Go out there and set that record! You can do it, You will need to infiltrate The Laym Studios in order to prove you are strong enough, To enter the next trials. But your task is not that simple... You need to do more. More than you are programmed to do.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 710 Or AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080ti Or AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
